summary: Another unnecessary mod that will make you happy
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#f1c232][b][size=6]Another Fabulous & Unnecessary mod by fredlaus: #[color=#cc0000]4[/color][/size][/b]
[size=4]Why unnecessary mods?
Because they make your game beautiful.
You get more place to live, stack your stuff and house your followers
- and increase your self-esteem dramatically.[size=4] He, he.[/size][/size]
[size=4][color=#f1c232]---------------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/size]
[/color][/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=3]22052016:
New version with script included.
If the mining doesn't work use this script.
After installing leave TS The Mine and wait for the script to knock in.[/size][/color][size=4][color=#f1c232]
---------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=#b6b6b6]This mine is very close to Riverwood. Just across the river.
If you are a milk drinker you use the bridge.
You can fast travel as well.
This one you'll have to fight for too.
The Mine and the Brewery are infested with Thalmor soldiers looking for some free drinks and fun.
Whatever fun is for the Thalmor.
This is also a valuable space for the player. Lots of rooms and beds and free area for you and your followers.
The brewery is equipped with a shower as well.
[size=3][size=3][size=3][size=3]This mod can be used along my[/size][/size][/size][/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75815/?]TS Free Mine Village[/url].
Remember, this mod is uploaded under Resources and tutorials.
The mod works well enough, but there is only one access atm and it is up to you make more.
My other Unnecessary mods:
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75776/]Mistwatch Twin Tower
[/url][color=#ffe599][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75769/]Tropical Docks of Solitude
[/url][color=#ffe599][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75778/]Mistwatch Supply Ship[/url][color=#ffe599][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75797/]
[/url][color=#ffe599][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75815/]TS Free Mine Village[/url][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/size]

The mod is not dependent on Tropical Skyrim. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]I am though.[/url][/color][/size][color=#b6b6b6]
I guess you will see some of Tamira's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22018]New Plants[/url] as well.
Iforgot to credit [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3122217]TheOldOne822[/url]. The creator of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9846]Free Mine[/url] which this mod is based on.[/color]
author: fredlaus and friends
